name: snac
description: snac2 is a minimalist self-hosted microblogging server implementing ActivityPub. It provides a lightweight interface for posting and federating with the Fediverse.

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Provides lightweight microblogging with minimal resource usage

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Publishes text posts with mentions, hashtags, and media attachments

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Alerts on mentions, follows, and interactions from other users

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Attaches images and files to posts with automatic processing

features.title: No Database
features.description: Stores all data in flat files for simplicity and portability
